languages.text: "Крударах пал, его останки скрыты во мраке Простора. Все, что мне теперь остается — последовать за {mf|тем|той}, кто позволил мне пройти этот путь до конца".
"Crudarach has fallen, its remains hidden in the darkness of the Expanse. All that is left for me to do now is to follow the one who allowed me to walk this path to the end."
languages.original_text: "Крударах пал, его останки скрыты во мраке Простора. Все, что мне теперь остается — последовать за {mf|тем|той}, кто позволил мне пройти этот путь до конца".

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Crudarach has fallen, its remains hidden in the darkness of the Expanse. All that is left for me to do now is to follow the one who allowed me to walk this path to the end."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “克鲁达拉赫已经陨落，它的残骸就隐藏在扩区的黑暗之中。而我现在要做的，就是追随那位允许我继续踏上这条道途的人。”
languages.original_text: "Crudarach has fallen, its remains hidden in the darkness of the Expanse. All that is left for me to do now is to follow the one who allowed me to walk this path to the end."

traits.locale_text: “克鲁达拉赫已经陨落，它的残骸就隐藏在扩区的黑暗之中。而我现在要做的，就是追随那位允许我继续踏上这条道途的人。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Crudarach n'est plus, et ses vestiges demeureront à jamais cachés dans les ténèbres des Étendues. Je me dois désormais de suivre {mf|celui|celle} qui m'a permis d'atteindre mon objectif. »
languages.original_text: "Crudarach has fallen, its remains hidden in the darkness of the Expanse. All that is left for me to do now is to follow the one who allowed me to walk this path to the end."

traits.locale_text: « Crudarach n'est plus, et ses vestiges demeureront à jamais cachés dans les ténèbres des Étendues. Je me dois désormais de suivre {mf|celui|celle} qui m'a permis d'atteindre mon objectif. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Crudarach ha caído y sus restos están ocultos por las sombras de la Extensión. Solo me queda seguir a quien me ha permitido llegar al final de mi senda».
languages.original_text: "Crudarach has fallen, its remains hidden in the darkness of the Expanse. All that is left for me to do now is to follow the one who allowed me to walk this path to the end."

traits.locale_text: «Crudarach ha caído y sus restos están ocultos por las sombras de la Extensión. Solo me queda seguir a quien me ha permitido llegar al final de mi senda».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「クルダラは落ち、その存在はエクスパンスの闇に隠れた。今の私に残されたのは、この道を終わりまで歩かせてくれる者に従うことだけだ」
languages.original_text: "Crudarach has fallen, its remains hidden in the darkness of the Expanse. All that is left for me to do now is to follow the one who allowed me to walk this path to the end."

traits.locale_text: 「クルダラは落ち、その存在はエクスパンスの闇に隠れた。今の私に残されたのは、この道を終わりまで歩かせてくれる者に従うことだけだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Crudarach ist gefallen, seine Überreste liegen in der Dunkelheit der Ausdehnung verborgen. Ich muss nun nur noch {mf|dem folgen, der|der folgen, die} mir gestattet hat, diesen Weg bis zum Ende zu beschreiten."
languages.original_text: "Crudarach has fallen, its remains hidden in the darkness of the Expanse. All that is left for me to do now is to follow the one who allowed me to walk this path to the end."

traits.locale_text: "Crudarach ist gefallen, seine Überreste liegen in der Dunkelheit der Ausdehnung verborgen. Ich muss nun nur noch {mf|dem folgen, der|der folgen, die} mir gestattet hat, diesen Weg bis zum Ende zu beschreiten."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Crudarach has fallen, its remains hidden in the darkness of the Expanse. All that is left for me to do now is to follow the one who allowed me to walk this path to the end."

languages.text: "Crudarach düştü, Enginlik'in karanlığında gizleniyor. Artık tek yapmam gereken, bu yolu sonuna dek yürümemi sağlayanın yanında olmak."
languages.original_text: "Crudarach has fallen, its remains hidden in the darkness of the Expanse. All that is left for me to do now is to follow the one who allowed me to walk this path to the end."
